revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Petalburg Woods |image = [[File:Petalburg Woods.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Petalburg Woods. |tokens = 12,000 |location = South of Rustboro City. }} '''Petalburg Woods''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 380,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena || rowspan=3|[[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Lyle || rowspan=3|[[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple, [[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple, [[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple, [[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple |- | [[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple |- | [[File:Silcoon.png|40px]] Silcoon |- | [[File:Cascoon.png|40px]] Cascoon || rowspan=3|[[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher James || rowspan=3|[[File:Nincada.png|40px]] Nincada, [[File:Nincada.png|40px]] Nincada |- | [[File:Taillow.png|40px]] Taillow |- | [[File:Shroomish.png|40px]] Shroomish |- |}
<!--T:5--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Slakoth.png|40px]] '''Slakoth*''' || <center> 860,000 || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena || <center> 860,000 |}
<!--T:6--> '''*Must have cleared Petalburg Woods at least once to unlock Slakoth'''
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<tabs> <!--T:8--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:9--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Pokéball}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 20.01% || 21.04% || 25.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Meadow Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Insect Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Iron Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 2.02% |- | {{Bag2|Miracle Seed}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 2.02% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:10-->
<!--T:11--> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:12--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Pokéball}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 24.00% || 24.00% || 24.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Meadow Plate}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | {{Bag2|Insect Plate}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | {{Bag2|Iron Plate}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | {{Bag2|Miracle Seed}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |} </tab> </tabs>
